## Voice.Listener namespace

Listener types for all events emitted by a [Voice object.](./twilio-voice-react-native.voice_class.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
namespace Listener 
```

## Type Aliases

|  Type Alias | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [AudioDevicesUpdated](./twilio-voice-react-native.voice_namespace.listener_namespace.audiodevicesupdated_typealias.md) | Audio devices updated event listener. This should be the function signature of an event listener bound to the [Voice.Event.AudioDevicesUpdated](./twilio-voice-react-native.voice_namespace.event_enum.md) event. |
|  [CallInvite](./twilio-voice-react-native.voice_namespace.listener_namespace.callinvite_typealias.md) | Call invite event listener. This should be the function signature of an event listener bound to the [Voice.Event.CallInvite](./twilio-voice-react-native.voice_namespace.event_enum.md) event. |
|  [CallInviteAccepted](./twilio-voice-react-native.voice_namespace.listener_namespace.callinviteaccepted_typealias.md) | Call invite accepted event listener. This should be the function signature of an event listener bound to the [Voice.Event.CallInviteAccepted](./twilio-voice-react-native.voice_namespace.event_enum.md) event. |
|  [CallInviteRejected](./twilio-voice-react-native.voice_namespace.listener_namespace.callinviterejected_typealias.md) | Call invite rejected event listener. This should be the function signature of an event listener bound to the [Voice.Event.CallInviteRejected](./twilio-voice-react-native.voice_namespace.event_enum.md) event. |
|  [CancelledCallInvite](./twilio-voice-react-native.voice_namespace.listener_namespace.cancelledcallinvite_typealias.md) | Call invite cancelled event listener. This should be the function signature of an event listener bound to the [Voice.Event.CancelledCallInvite](./twilio-voice-react-native.voice_namespace.event_enum.md) event. |
|  [Error](./twilio-voice-react-native.voice_namespace.listener_namespace.error_typealias.md) | Error event listener. This should be the function signature of an event listener bound to the [Voice.Event.Error](./twilio-voice-react-native.voice_namespace.event_enum.md) event. |
|  [Generic](./twilio-voice-react-native.voice_namespace.listener_namespace.generic_typealias.md) | Generic event listener. This should be the function signature of any event listener bound to any voice event. |
|  [Registered](./twilio-voice-react-native.voice_namespace.listener_namespace.registered_typealias.md) | Registered event listener. This should be the function signature of an event listener bound to the [Voice.Event.Registered](./twilio-voice-react-native.voice_namespace.event_enum.md) event. |
|  [Unregistered](./twilio-voice-react-native.voice_namespace.listener_namespace.unregistered_typealias.md) | Unregistered event listener. This should be the function signature of an event listener bound to the [Voice.Event.Unregistered](./twilio-voice-react-native.voice_namespace.event_enum.md) event. |
